text: Ronaldo (born 18 September 1976) is a retired Brazilian football player. Ronaldo is widely regarded as one of the greatest players of all time. He won two World Cups in 1994 and 2002 and the 1997 Ballon d'Or. == Club career statistics == Appearances and goals by club, season and competition Club Season League State league National cup
